title: William Afton Purple Guy from hit Indie Game FNAF

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, attack a player, putting them in a costume if they die. Costumed players do not appear as dead until someone visits them at night, revealing their death to all players. They are also revealed to be dead if they would be hanged during the day.
- At night, you can visit a costumed player to put on their suit, gaining an autovest but revealing them as dead the day afterwards and removing their costume.
